display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
External Senses
────────
See: gray, four legs, sharp teeth
Hear: growling
Smell: predator scent

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Common Sense
────────
Integrates all modalities
Unified perception: 'one thing'

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Imagination (Phantasia)
────────
Stores phantasm:
'Image of gray four-legged thing'
────────
Atemporal storage
Can picture it anytime
Available for manipulation

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Estimative Power
────────
Reads phantasm from imagination
Perceives: 'FLEE-FROM-ABLE'
────────
Not just sensing form
Grasping practical meaning

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Memory (Memorativa)
────────
Stores:
• Intention: 'flee-from-able'
• Temporal: 'YESTERDAY'
• Spatial: 'in THAT meadow'
• References: phantasm in imagination
────────
Recognition: 'This represents
something I actually experienced'

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Memory retrieves:
'I encountered flee-from-able thing
YESTERDAY in that meadow'
────────
References phantasm still in imagination
Adds temporal/intentional context
